reviews.review_msg: Brilliant guy and interesting material but I don't recommend taking his class. His lectures and his manner of speaking are really slow and it can be difficult to know what you're going to be tested on. Often entire lectures are not tested. No multiple choice on tests, and not much room to answer questions.

Dr. Hoffer is hands down one of the best profs I've had in my undergrad. He really cares for his students and genuinely wants everyone to do well. The tests are difficult because of the material that you need to know but Dr. Hoffer gives as many marks as he can. The material is very interesting and hearing all his stories makes you love the course.
